script:
MY PROCESS IS COMPLETE.
        MY HOST WILL BE VERY PLEASED, AFTER I WASH OFF MY RUST AND TURN THIS PLACE INTO A IONIZING CRATER.

     THIS IS YOUR RETRIBUTION. YOU SHOULD ALL BE GRATEFUL...

   I WAS CREATED BY A GENIUS, A TRUE SCHOLAR WHO FOUND THE KEY TO BYPASSING S-S.
